com.metreeca.rest

Interface Format<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the message body representation managed by the body format
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataFormat, EntityFormat, InputFormat, JSONFormat, MultipartFormat, OutputFormat, ReaderFormat, TextFormat, WriterFormat

    public interface Format<V>
    Message body format.

    Manages the conversion between message body representations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Result<V,Failure> get(Message<?> message)
      Retrieves a body representation from a message.
      default <M extends Message<M>>
      M      		 set(M message, V value)
      Configures a message to hold a body representation.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        default Result<V,Failure> get(Message<?> message)
        Retrieves a body representation from a message.

        Processing failure should be reported using the following HTTP status codes:

        • Response.UnsupportedMediaType for missing bodies;
        • Response.BadRequest for malformed bodies, unless a more specific status code is available.

        The default implementation returns a failure reporting the Response.UnsupportedMediaType status, unless explicitly overridden.

        Parameters:
        message - the message whose body representation managed by this body format is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        a value providing access to the body representation managed by this body format, if it was possible to derive one from message; an error providing access to the processing failure, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if message is null

      • set

        default <M extends Message<M>> M set(M message,
                                     V value)
        Configures a message to hold a body representation.

        The default implementation has no effects.

        Type Parameters:
        M - the type of message
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be configured to hold a body representation managed by this body format
        value - the body representation being configured for message by this body format
        Returns:
        the configured message
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either message or value is null
